question:
Which of the following are the advantages of Electronic Voting Machine (EVM)?
1. It eliminates the possibility of invalid and doubtful votes.
2. It makes the process of counting of votes much faster.
3. It reduces cost of printing.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Some of the advantages of Electronic Voting Machine (EVM) are: (1) It eliminates the possibility of invalid and doubtful votes, (2) It makes the process of counting of votes much faster, (3) It reduces cost of printing.
